title: Awareness 1
copy: Who is aware of the thought "I am"?

title: Awareness 2
copy: Wait for the next thought to come. Are you that thought?

title: Awareness 3
copy: Look at something in your environment. As you look at it, ask who is looking.

title: Awareness 4
copy: Close your eyes, and notice the space around and between thoughts. Who is aware of that space?

title: Awareness 5
copy: Who are you? (Answer this question in your mind). Who is observing the thoughts which are responding to this question?
